Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.name: data(_:)
Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.abstract: Data to be written to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.name: text(_:_:)
Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.abstract: Text to be written to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.name: file(_:)
Structs/Input/Value.html#/s:10Subprocess.abstract: File to be written to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.name: data(_:)
Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.abstract: Creates input for writing data to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.name: text(_:encoding:)
Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.abstract: Creates input for writing text to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.name: file(path:)
Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.abstract: Creates input for writing contents of file at path to stdin of the child process

Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.name: file(url:)
Structs/Input.html#/s:10Subprocess5Input.abstract: Creates input for writing contents of file URL to stdin of the child process

Protocols/SubprocessDependencyFactory.ht.name: createInputPipe(for:)
Protocols/SubprocessDependencyFactory.ht.abstract: Creates a Pipe and writes given data

Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.name: exitedWithNoneZeroStatus(_:)
Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.abstract: The process completed with a none-zero exit code

Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.name: unexpectedPropertyListObject(_:)
Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.abstract: The property list object could not be casted into expected type

Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.name: unexpectedJSONObject(_:)
Enums/SubprocessError.html#/s:10Subproce.abstract: The JSON object could not be casted into expected type

Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.name: isRunning
Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.abstract: Returns whether the process is still running.

Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.name: launch(input:outputHandler:errorHandler:terminationHandler:)
Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.abstract: Launches command with read handlers and termination handler

Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.name: DataTerminationHandler
Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.abstract: Block type called for executing process returning data from standard out and standard error

Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.name: launch(input:terminationHandler:)
Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.abstract: Launches command calling a block when process terminates

Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.name: waitForTermination()
Classes/Subprocess.html#/s:10SubprocessA.abstract: Waits for process to complete and all handlers to be called

Classes/Shell/OutputOptions.html#/s:10Su.name: combined
Classes/Shell/OutputOptions.html#/s:10Su.abstract: Processes data written to both stdout and stderr

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:transformBlock:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command using a supplied block to tranform the process output into whatever type you would like

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command expecting exit code of zero and returning the output data

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:encoding:transformBlock:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command using a supplied block to tranform the process output as a String

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:encoding:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command expecting exit code of zero and returning the output as a string

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: execPropertyList(input:options:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command expecting a property list

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:decoder:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command expecting JSON and decodes object conforming to Decodable

Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.name: exec(input:options:decoder:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:10Subprocess5Shell.abstract: Executes shell command expecting property list and decodes object conforming to Decodable
